solution_line_template: It takes him {hours_to_learn_rules}*{proficiency_multiplier}=<<{hours_to_learn_rules}*{proficiency_multiplier}={hours_to_proficient}>>{hours_to_proficient} hours to go from knowing how to play to proficient
So he spends {hours_to_proficient}+{hours_to_learn_rules}=<<{hours_to_proficient}+{hours_to_learn_rules}={combined_hours}>>{combined_hours} hours combined on those
So it takes him {master_multiplier}*{combined_hours}=<<{master_multiplier}*{combined_hours}={hours_to_master}>>{hours_to_master} hours to become a master from proficient
So the total time was {combined_hours}+{hours_to_master}=<<{combined_hours}+{hours_to_master}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours
